languages.text: "Шерин, не говорите ни слова! Вы жаждете досуга, и у меня есть отличная идея, как совместить интеллектуальный отдых с дегустацией изысканных напитков!"
languages.translation_comment: ставим доску регицида на край ванной, рядом сажаем джай, игрока в ванной двигаем поближе
ставим доску регицида на край ванной, рядом сажаем джай, игрока в ванной двигаем поближе

languages.text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, не говорите ни слова! Вы жаждете досуга, и у меня есть отличная идея, как совместить интеллектуальный отдых с дегустацией изысканных напитков!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, do not say a word! You have a craving for leisure, and I have a majestic idea on how to combine intellectual recreation with the tasting of the finest drinks!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, do not say a word! You have a craving for leisure, and I have a majestic idea on how to combine intellectual recreation with the tasting of the finest drinks!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

languages.text: « Shereen ! Alors comme ça, vous avez besoin qu'on vous divertisse ? Vous avez bien fait de m'appeler, parce que j'ai la solution idéale pour tromper votre ennui ! Je vais vous montrer comment combiner les joies de la boisson et les rigueurs de la récréation intellectuelle en un passe-temps littéralement grisant ! »
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen ! Alors comme ça, vous avez besoin qu'on vous divertisse ? Vous avez bien fait de m'appeler, parce que j'ai la solution idéale pour tromper votre ennui ! Je vais vous montrer comment combiner les joies de la boisson et les rigueurs de la récréation intellectuelle en un passe-temps littéralement grisant ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Shereen! ¡He oído que necesitas entretenimiento! No se preocupe, ¡tengo la solución! ¡Le enseñaré los placeres de la bebida y los rigores de la recreación intelectual en un mismo pasatiempo espectacular!».
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Shereen! ¡He oído que necesitas entretenimiento! No se preocupe, ¡tengo la solución! ¡Le enseñaré los placeres de la bebida y los rigores de la recreación intelectual en un mismo pasatiempo espectacular!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的！我听说你想娱乐一下！好啦，不要紧，我这里刚好有最合适的娱乐活动！我可以向你展示一下，如何将饮酒的乐趣与智慧的火花结合在一起，带来令人无比愉悦的消遣！”
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的！我听说你想娱乐一下！好啦，不要紧，我这里刚好有最合适的娱乐活动！我可以向你展示一下，如何将饮酒的乐趣与智慧的火花结合在一起，带来令人无比愉悦的消遣！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シェリーン！娯楽が必要なんですって？ご心配なく。完璧な解決法があります！お酒の楽しさと難しい知的レクリエーションを組み合わせて、ひとつの素晴らしい娯楽に融合させる方法をお教えしましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン！娯楽が必要なんですって？ご心配なく。完璧な解決法があります！お酒の楽しさと難しい知的レクリエーションを組み合わせて、ひとつの素晴らしい娯楽に融合させる方法をお教えしましょう！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen! Wie ich höre, braucht Ihr Unterhaltung! Nun, seid unbesorgt. Ich habe die perfekte Lösung! Ich zeige Euch, wie Ihr die Freuden des Trinkens und die Anstrengungen des intellektuellen Zeitvertreibs zu einer unglaublichen Freizeitbeschäftigung vereinen könnt!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen! Wie ich höre, braucht Ihr Unterhaltung! Nun, seid unbesorgt. Ich habe die perfekte Lösung! Ich zeige Euch, wie Ihr die Freuden des Trinkens und die Anstrengungen des intellektuellen Zeitvertreibs zu einer unglaublichen Freizeitbeschäftigung vereinen könnt!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim! Duyduğuma göre şenlenmeye ihtiyacın varmış! Sen hiç merak etme, çaren benim! Sana içki içmenin keyfiyle entelektüel dinlencenin oturaklılığını nasıl birleştirip harika zaman geçirebileceğini göstereceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen! I hear you are in need of entertainment! Well, do not worry. I have the perfect solution! I will show you how to combine the joys of drinking and the rigours of intellectual recreation into one incredible pastime!"
